Hi all. So I've updated to 1.0.5 build 1028 and at first everything seemed ok. Took an old simple rocket into LKO, no worries there. I attempted to lower my landing legs and the game jerked terribly every couple of seconds whilst lowering. After that it kept doing it, jerky pauses?

I have the same graphics settings etc as 1.0.4. Anyone else had this issue?

The legs im using are the LT-2 and they work fine on a really small rocket, but the one im flying now has only 76 parts and worked perfectly before updating?

EDIT - just tried a 133 part rocket I built and the legs work fine? I dont understand this?

Thanks in advance.

Edited November 11, 2015 by maceemiller

Assuming you can repeat the behavior with a specific ship, it might help if you can post the .craft or the save file for us to take a look at.

Cheers,

~Claw
Once im back on my computer in about 8 hours I will attempt to put the craft file on here. thankyou.
